definition.text: Ok, my friend... It's time for the real deal! Are you ready for a little Live Trading Session?

paragraphs.text: I'll help you with the three main requirements:
Check your parameters, in particular, decide how much capital you wish to assign to the session.
Set up an Exchange Account Key so that the app may access your account at the exchange.
Ensure a live data feed, that is, the data mining operation with the indicators required by the Trading System must be running and up to date.
If you are not ready to do some live trading for whatever reason, no worries, just keep going.
